title: how a LV28 can get a solo ranked game ???
body: how come a Lv28 player can able to get in rank ???? did anyone know what is going on? or something has been changed that i didnt know?

replies.body: There level has probably not been updated on the site you are checking yet. They are more then likely a newly leveled 30 account. The level 30 check for ranked is server sided I believe.

Majorah is most likely correct. You're not able to play ranked until lvl 30, and sometimes those levels can be a little slow to update. Most likely he just recently hit 30 and his level hasn't updated correctly yet.
